card.name: Galion
card.text: Unique. Tap Galion to cancel attack against his company keyed to Woodland Realm.

card.name: Heladil
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against spiders. +1 direct influence against the Wood-elves faction.

card.name: Avari
card.text: Playable at any Elf-hold outsite of Eriador, Gondor, Mordor and/or Wilderland if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Men (-2), Dwarves (-2), Elves (+2).

card.name: Axe-master
card.text: Warrior-only. Dwarf, elf, man or orc only, if bearing an axe. This card may also be played as a minion resource. Before resolving a creature attack (with equal or less strikes than the prowess bonus the axe he is bearing is giving to him vs. this creature (may not be used against creatures where each character faces a strike), bearer may opt to face the creature as though he were a one-character company. If the creature is defeated, the attack against the company is canceled and bearer makes a corruption check; if the creature is ineffectful the attack resolves normally; if the creature is succesfull discard bearer's axe along with this card; in any case tap the item afterwards. This card gives 2 corruption points to a minion bearer.

card.name: Blade-master
card.text: Warrior-only. Dunadan, elf, men, orc, ringwraith or Alatar only, if bearing a blade (e.g.Aiglos, Glamdring, or Sting, but noa an axe). This card may also be played as a minion resource. Before resolving a creature attack (with equal or 1 more marshalling points than the prowess bonus the blade he is bearing is giving to him vs. this creature), bearer may opt to face the creature as though he were a one-character company. If the creature is defeated, the attack against the company receives -X strikes equal to the weapon prowess bonus vs. this creature bearer makes a corruption check; if the creature is ineffectful the attack resolves normally; if the creature is succesfull bearer is wounded (no body check required); in any case tap the item afterwards. This card gives 2 corruption points to a minion bearer.

card.name: Mace-master
card.text: Warrior-only. Dwarf, troll, wose or The Witch-king only, if bearing a flail, hammer or mace. This card may also be played as a minion resource. Before resolving a creature attack (with equal or less strikes than the prowess bonus the flail, hammer or mace he is bearing is giving to him vs. this creature (may not be used against creatures where each character faces a strike), bearer may opt to face the creature as though he were a one-character company. If the creature is defeated, the attack against the company receives -2 prowess and -2 body and bearer makes a corruption check; if the creature is ineffectful the attack resolves normally; if the creature is succesfull bearer is wounded (no body check required); in any case tap the item afterwards. This card gives 2 corruption points to a minion bearer.

card.name: Terror of Cardolan
card.text: Unique. Aradagor specific. Only playable if Aradagor is a War-Lord. Your companies with a company size of 2 or less or with Aradagor may play allies at tapped sites. This card can be played in the starting company in lieu of a character. +1 corruption checks for followers of Aradagor. Aradagor cannot be discarded from the result of a body check. +2 direct against trolls.
